name: A Different Kind Of Human
content: 你好 你好 你好 你好
你好 你好 你好 你好
我们一直在期待这次相见
超人 你会在我感到无助时陪在我身边吗
你会在睡觉时梦见我吗
We have come here for you
This world you're live in is not
A place for someone like you
并不适合像你这样的人
Come on let us take you home
来吧 让我们带你回家
不要怕我们 有人会保护你的
We have come here for you
This world you're live in is not
A place for someone like you
并不适合像你这样的人
Come on let us take you home
来吧 让我们带你回家
And we have to get you out of here
我们必须带你离开这里
We have come here for you
This world you're live in is not
A place for someone like you
并不适合像你这样的人
Come on let us take you home
来吧 让我们带你回家

This world you're live in is not
A place for someone like you
并不适合像你这样的人
